name: IndexTableBaseProps

members.name: sortable
members.description: List of booleans, which maps to whether sorting is enabled or not for each column. Defaults to false for all columns.

members.name: defaultSortDirection
members.description:
* The direction to sort the table rows on first click or keypress of a sortable column heading. Defaults to descending.
   * @default 'descending'

members.name: sortColumnIndex
members.description: * The index of the heading that the table rows are sorted by.

members.name: sortToggleLabels
members.description:
Optional dictionary of sort toggle labels for each sortable column, with ascending and descending label,
   * with the key as the index of the column

members.name: hasZebraStriping
members.description: Add zebra striping to table rows

members.name: pagination
members.description: Properties to enable pagination at the bottom of the table.
